sentences.en: A large stash of drugs had been found aboard the yacht.
sentences.cn: 在游艇上找到了一大批藏匿的毒品。

sentences.en: And you will have your personal garage to stash your rides.
sentences.cn: 你将拥有自己的个人修车场以隐藏你的赛车.

sentences.en: Grab that cash with both hands and make a stash.
sentences.cn: 抢到现金,双手做出了储存数.

sentences.en: I should secretly stash away some money.
sentences.cn: 我应该暗地里藏些私房钱.

sentences.en: I strip off my clothes and stash them in a locker.
sentences.cn: 我脱下衣服,存放在抽屉里.

sentences.en: If you're all outta room, you can stick in your stash.
sentences.cn: 如果你一直在外面, 你可以找个地方躲着不出来.

sentences.en: It is a slack season and we're going to stash business.
sentences.cn: 现在是生意萧条的季节,咱们不久就要停止营业了.

sentences.en: It's a slack season and we're going to stash business.
sentences.cn: 现在是生意萧条的季节,咱们不久就要停业了.

sentences.en: Not sure why? Put a small stash of cash aside for emergencies.
sentences.cn: 不知道这是为什么? 藏一些现金用于紧急情况.

sentences.en: Or a stash of cocaine under the sink.
sentences.cn: 要不他们就是在什么神秘地方藏着可卡因呢.

sentences.en: Put a small stash of cash aside for emergencies.
sentences.cn: 藏一些现金用于紧急情况.

sentences.en: Stash it forrainy day and let someone else fix dinner.
sentences.cn: 要未雨绸缪,让别人去打点晚餐.

sentences.en: That's supposed to be in our private stash.
There are 900000 stash books and 200000 foreign language books in the library.
sentences.cn: 学校图书馆现有藏书90万册,其中外文图书20万册.

sentences.en: We went for the bottle of whisky that we had stashed behind the bookcase.
sentences.cn: 我们去取那瓶我们藏在书柜后面的威士忌。

sentences.en: We'll bring him back and stash him in the hospital.
sentences.cn: 我们要把他带回来,藏在医院里.

trans.tran_en: an amount of something that is kept in a secret place, especially money, weapons, or drugs
to store something secretly or safely somewhere
to store something secretly or safely somewhere
